text:
//Network settings
rate "821288"
cl_cmdrate "128"
cl_updaterate "128"
cl_interpolate "1"
cl_interp_ratio "1"
cl_interp "0.01364"
cl_updatevisibility "1"
cl_lagcompensation "1"
cl_predict "1"
cl_predictweapons "1"
cl_timeout "999999"


//Headphones settings
windows_speaker_config "1"
snd_front_headphone_position "90.0"
snd_rear_headphone_position "90.0"
snd_headphone_pan_exponent "1.0"
snd_headphone_pan_radial_weight "0.0"
snd_use_hrtf "1"


//Crosshair
cl_crosshair_drawoutline "0"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_maxdist_splitratio "1.000000"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_innermod "1.000000"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitalpha_outermod "1"
cl_crosshair_dynamic_splitdist "3"
cl_crosshair_outlinethickness "1.000000"
cl_crosshair_sniper_show_normal_inaccuracy "0"
cl_crosshair_sniper_width "1"
cl_crosshair_t "0"
cl_crosshairalpha "255"
cl_crosshaircolor "5"
cl_crosshaircolor_b "0"
cl_crosshaircolor_g "0"
cl_crosshaircolor_r "255"
cl_crosshairdot "0"
cl_crosshairgap "-1.500000"
cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue "0"
cl_crosshairscale "4"
cl_crosshairsize "4"
cl_crosshairstyle "4"
cl_crosshairthickness "0"
cl_crosshairusealpha "1"
cl_fixedcrosshairgap "-1"


//Nade throw toggle
bind alt nadetoggleon
alias "nadetoggleon" "cl_crosshairsize 255; bind alt nadetoggleoff"
alias "nadetoggleoff" "cl_crosshairsize 4; bind alt nadetoggleon"


//Graphics settings
cl_forcepreload 1
cl_disablefreezecam 1
func_break_max_pieces 0


//Viewmodel settings
viewmodel_offset_x "1"
viewmodel_offset_y "2"
viewmodel_offset_z "-2"
viewmodel_fov "68"
cl_bob_lower_amt "30"
cl_bobamt_lat "0"
cl_bobamt_vert "0"
cl_viewmodel_shift_left_amt "0"
cl_viewmodel_shift_right_amt "0"
cl_drawhud 1
bindtoggle MOUSE3 cl_righthand


//Help messages
gameinstructor_enable "0"
cl_autohelp "0"
cl_showhelp "0"
bindtoggle c gameinstructor_enable


//Net graph on tab
alias +shownet "+showscores; net_graphheight 64"
alias -shownet "-showscores; net_graphheight 9999"
net_graph 1
bind TAB +shownet


//Damage given and taken
con_filter_text "Damage given"
con_filter_text_out Player:
con_filter_enable 2
developer 1


//Jump throw
alias "+jumpthrow" "+jump;-attack" 
alias "-jumpthrow" "-jump" 
bind z "+jumpthrow"


// Instant C4 drop
bind "v" "use weapon_knife;use weapon_c4;drop"


//Switch to knife and back to active weapon
alias +knife slot3
alias -knife lastinv
bind q +knife


//Jump on scroll
bind MWHEELUP "+jump"
bind MWHEELDOWN "+jump"


//Manual volume change
alias "volmin" "volume 0.0;echo  |*__________| VOLUME   0% MINIMUM!;alias volup vol1;alias voldn ngmin"
alias "vol1"   "volume 0.1;echo  |_*_________| VOLUME  10%;alias volup vol2;alias voldn volmin"
alias "vol2"   "volume 0.2;echo  |__*________| VOLUME  20%;alias volup vol3;alias voldn vol1"
alias "vol3"   "volume 0.3;echo  |___*_______| VOLUME  30%;alias volup vol4;alias voldn vol2"
alias "vol4"   "volume 0.4;echo  |____*______| VOLUME  40%;alias volup vol5;alias voldn vol3"
alias "vol5"   "volume 0.5;echo  |_____*_____| VOLUME  50%;alias volup vol6;alias voldn vol4"
alias "vol6"   "volume 0.6;echo  |______*____| VOLUME  60%;alias volup vol7;alias voldn vol5"
alias "vol7"   "volume 0.7;echo  |_______*___| VOLUME  70%;alias volup vol8;alias voldn vol6"
alias "vol8"   "volume 0.8;echo  |________*__| VOLUME  80%;alias volup vol9;alias voldn vol7"
alias "vol9"   "volume 0.9;echo  |_________*_| VOLUME  90%;alias volup vol10;alias voldn vol8"
alias "vol10"  "volume 1.0;echo  |__________*| VOLUME 100% MAXIMUM!;alias voldn vol9"
alias "volup" "vol2"
alias "voldn" "volmin"
bind "=" "volup"
bind "-" "voldn"


//Buy binds
bind "kp_5" "buy galilar; buy famas;"
bind "kp_leftarrow" "buy ak47; buy m4a1;"
bind "kp_plus" "buy ssg08;"
bind "" "buy sg556; buy aug;"
bind "kp_enter" "buy awp;"
bind "" "buy g3sg1; buy scar20;"
bind "kp_ins" "buy mac10; buy mp9;"
bind "kp_del" "buy mp7;"
bind "kp_rightarrow" "buy ump45;"
bind "" "buy p90;"
bind "" "buy bizon;"
bind "" "buy nova;"
bind "" "buy xm1014;"
bind "" "buy sawedoff; buy mag7;"
bind "" "buy m249;"
bind "" "buy negev;"
bind "" "buy glock; buy hkp2000;"
bind "" "buy elite;"
bind "kp_minus" "buy p250;"
bind "kp_slash" "buy tec9; buy fiveseven;"
bind "kp_multiply" "buy deagle;"
bind "kp_end" "buy vest;"
bind "kp_downarrow" "buy vesthelm;"
bind "" "buy taser 34;"
bind "kp_pgdn" "buy defuser;"
bind "uparrow" "buy molotov; buy incgrenade;"
bind "" "buy decoy;"
bind "leftarrow" "buy flashbang;"
bind "downarrow" "buy hegrenade;"
bind "rightarrow" "buy smokegrenade;"


//Clear decals
bind "w" "+speed;r_cleardecals"
bind "ctrl" "+duck;r_cleardecals"
bind "r" "+reload;r_cleardecals"
bind "shift" "+walk;r_cleardecals"


//misc commands
cl_radar_always_centered 0
cl_radar_scale 0.6
bind "space" "+jump;+cl_show_team_equipment"
bind x "toggle voice_scale 1 0.1"
cl_use_opens_buy_menu 0
alias "dc" "disconnect"


//Console confirmation message
echo "------------------------------------------------------"
echo "------------------------------------------------------"
echo "----------------Autoexec Config loaded----------------" 
echo "------------------------------------------------------"
echo "------------------------------------------------------"
host_writeconfig
title: Autoexec
